                                               SECTION A

Answer all questions in this section.

Biological Perspective

1.    Outline one strength and one limitation of the biological perspective in explaining one
      psychological or social question.                                                          [8 marks]


Cognitive Perspective

2.    Explain one theoretical explanation of human behaviour from the cognitive
      perspective.                                                                               [8 marks]


Learning Perspective

3.    Explain one contribution of the learning perspective to the scientific study
      of behaviour.                                                                              [8 marks]
